rukus.text: 16|22|neohuiui sin-eun hollo gyesin hananim-ila geuleona naeseleul midji ani han jadeul-eun geudeul-ui ma-eum-i saagha yeo omanham-eul peoudeola
16|23|hananim-eun geudeul-i sumgineun geos gwa bakk-eulo natanaeneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesimae omanhan jadeul-eul salangha ji ani hasinola
16|24|geudeul-ege neohui junim-i mueos eul gyesihaessneunyo lago mul-euni yesnal uhwadeul-ila malhayeossdeola
16|25|geudeullo hayeogeum simpan-ui nal geudeul-ui joeaggwa geudeul-i mujihayeo bang hwangke han joeag-eul jilm-eojidolog hali ni geudeul-i jilm-eojil geugeos-e jeojuga iss-eulila
